settings.title: Settings
settings.backgroundDesc: Choose a background image for the application
settings.viewModeDesc: Change how apps are displayed in the store
settings.acceleratedDownloadDesc: Uses multi-threading to accelerate downloads, but may increase server load
settings.autoRunDesc: Automatically runs executable files after download (only for executable files)
settings.autoExtractDesc: Automatically extracts compressed files after download (supports common formats like zip, rar)
settings.systemInfoDescription: View detailed system information of the current runtime environment, including operating system, architecture, version and more
settings.downloadPathDesc: Set the location where downloaded files are saved
settings.downloadOptionsDesc: Configure download behavior and performance settings
settings.autoRunDesc: Automatically run executable files after download completion (for executable files only)
settings.autoExtractDesc: Automatically extract compressed files after download (supports zip, rar and other common formats)
settings.showNotificationsDesc: Display system notifications when downloads complete or fail
settings.useProxyDesc: Download through proxy server, suitable for restricted network environments
settings.proxyUrlDesc: Complete proxy server address, format: http://host:port
settings.retryCountDesc: Maximum number of retries when download fails
settings.useMultiThreadDesc: Use multi-threading technology to accelerate downloads and significantly improve download speed
settings.threadCountDesc: Number of concurrent download threads, recommended to set between 4-16
settings.chunkSizeDesc: Size of each download chunk (MB), affects memory usage and download efficiency
settings.enableSpeedTestDesc: Test network speed before downloading to optimize download strategy
settings.retryCountDesc: Maximum number of retries when download fails

sourceManager.title: Source Manager
sourceManager.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this source?
sourceManager.dragDropFiles: Click or drag JSON files here to upload
sourceManager.githubSupport: GitHub links are supported and will be automatically converted to raw content links
sourceManager.noSources: No sources available. Please add a source.
